attributes.action: Investigate why Light bulbs  are  now so expensive, please
attributes.additional_details:
I am incandescent with rage  over the price of light bulbs.

There can be no logical reason why the price  has risen by such a massive percentage  over recent years.

Please  ask the European Commission to  lift the ban on the manufacture of Incandescent light bulbs.   Is this yet another   example  of consumers in the UK  being "scammed"   by European  regulations?
